verses.verse: Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there <S%H3426>was<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, Why do ye look one upon <S%H7200>another<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Behold<s%>, I have heard that there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: get you <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7666>thither<s%>, and buy for us from <S%H2421>thence<s%>; that we may live, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H1250>grain<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

But <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> not with his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; for he <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest <S%H6435>peradventure<s%> <S%H611>harm<s%> befall <S%H7122>him<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> those that <S%H935>came<s%>: for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was the <S%H7989>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%>; he it was that <S%H7666>sold<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> themselves to him with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and he <S%H5234>knew<s%> <S%H5234>them<s%>, but made himself strange unto <S%H1696>them<s%>, and spake <S%H7186>roughly<s%> with <S%H559>them<s%>; and he said unto <S%H370>them<s%>, Whence <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H559>ye<s%>? And they said, From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5234>knew<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, but they knew not <S%H5234>him<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> of <S%H559>them<s%>, and said unto <S%H7270>them<s%>, Ye are spies; to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> ye are <S%H935>come<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H113>him<s%>, Nay, my lord, but to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>.
We <S%H5168><s%> are all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>; we are <S%H3651>true<s%> <S%H5650>men<s%>, thy servants are no <S%H7270>spies<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, Nay, but to see the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> ye are <S%H935>come<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, We thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; <S%H6996>and<s%>, behold, the youngest is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%>, and one is <S%H259>not<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1696>them<s%>, That is it that I spake unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Ye are <S%H7270>spies<s%>:

hereby <S%H2063><s%> ye shall be <S%H974>proved<s%>: by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> ye shall not go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6996>hence<s%>, except your youngest <S%H251>brother<s%> come <S%H935>hither<s%>.

Send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3947>you<s%>, and let him fetch your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H631>bound<s%>, that your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H974>proved<s%>, whether there be <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> <S%H3808>you<s%>: or else by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> surely ye are <S%H7270>spies<s%>.
And he put them all <S%H622>together<s%> into <S%H4929>ward<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, This <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>; for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>:

if ye be <S%H3651>true<s%> <S%H259>men<s%>, let one of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> be <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H1004>your<s%> <S%H4929>prison-house<s%>; but <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H935>ye<s%>, carry <S%H7668>grain<s%> for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses<s%>:

and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> unto <S%H1697>me<s%>; so shall your words be <S%H539>verified<s%>, and ye shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>. And they did <S%H6213>so<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, We are <S%H61>verily<s%> <S%H818>guilty<s%> concerning our <S%H251>brother<s%>, in <S%H834>that<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6869>distress<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, when he <S%H2603>besought<s%> <S%H8085>us<s%>, and we would not hear; therefore is this <S%H6869>distress<s%> come upon <S%H935>us<s%>.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Spake <S%H559>I<s%> not unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Do not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3206>child<s%>; and ye would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? therefore <S%H1818>also<s%>, behold, his blood is <S%H1875>required<s%>.
And they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8085>understood<s%> <S%H3887>them<s%>; for there was an interpreter between them.

And he turned himself <S%H5437>about<s%> from <S%H1058>them<s%>, and wept; and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H1696>them<s%>, and spake to <S%H3947>them<s%>, and took <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> from among <S%H631>them<s%>, and bound him before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> with <S%H1250>grain<s%>, and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3701>money<s%> into his <S%H8242>sack<s%>, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H6720>provisions<s%> for the <S%H1870>way<s%>: and <S%H3651>thus<s%> was it done unto <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And they <S%H5375>laded<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> with their <S%H7668>grain<s%>, and departed <S%H3212>thence<s%>.

And as <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H8242>sack<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%> in the <S%H4411>lodging-place<s%>, he <S%H7200>espied<s%> his <S%H3701>money<s%>; <S%H6310>and<s%>, behold, it was in the mouth of his <S%H572>sack<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, My <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H7725>restored<s%>; <S%H2009>and<s%>, lo, it is even in my <S%H572>sack<s%>: and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> <S%H2729>them<s%>, and they turned trembling <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What is this that <S%H430>God<s%> hath done unto <S%H6213>us<s%>?

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that had <S%H7136>befallen<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying,
The <S%H376>man<s%>, the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> with <S%H5414>us<s%>, and took us for <S%H7270>spies<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>.
And we <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3651>him<s%>, We are true <S%H7270>men<s%>; we are no spies:

we are <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> is <S%H6996>not<s%>, and the youngest is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%>, the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>us<s%>, Hereby shall I know that ye are <S%H3651>true<s%> <S%H3240>men<s%>: leave <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> with <S%H3947>me<s%>, and take grain for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and go your <S%H3212>way<s%>;

and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>: then shall I know that ye are no <S%H7270>spies<s%>, but that ye are <S%H3651>true<s%> <S%H5414>men<s%>: so will I deliver you your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and ye shall <S%H5503>traffic<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to pass as they <S%H7324>emptied<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks<s%>, <S%H376>that<s%>, behold, every man's <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> was in his <S%H8242>sack<s%>: and when they and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> their <S%H6872>bundles<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>, they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7921>them<s%>, Me have ye bereaved of my <S%H3130>children<s%>: Joseph is <S%H8095>not<s%>, and Simeon is <S%H3947>not<s%>, and ye will take Benjamin <S%H1144>away<s%>: all these things are against me.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4191>Slay<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, if I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not to <S%H5414>thee<s%>: deliver him into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and I will bring him to thee <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not go <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H251>you<s%>; for his brother is <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and he only is <S%H7604>left<s%>: if <S%H611>harm<s%> <S%H7122>befall<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which ye <S%H3212>go<s%>, then will ye bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
